SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RunScriptAction"
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_JAR_PATH#"' : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_CMD
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_SRC_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -sourcepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Invoking java binar &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
